item.title: Feature Detection, Part 1: Image Derivatives, Gradients, and Sobel Operator
item.description: An introduction to image derivatives and gradients using OpenCV, explaining how to implement Sobel and Scharr operators for edge detection.

item.title: Custom Training Pipeline for Object Detection Models
item.description: A comprehensive guide to building a custom object detection training pipeline using PyTorch, covering dataset processing, augmentations, and model integration.

item.title: Mastering Object Detection: Training YOLO on Custom Objects
item.description: A step-by-step guide to training YOLOv11 on custom objects, covering dataset preparation, configuration, and evaluation.

item.title: YOLOv2 & YOLO9000 Paper Walkthrough: Better, Faster, Stronger
item.description: A detailed walkthrough of the YOLOv2 architecture and its PyTorch implementation from scratch, including Darknet-19, passthrough layers, and anchor boxes.

item.title: Outlier Detection With Autoencoders
item.description: Building an outlier detector using autoencoders in TensorFlow to identify anomalies in data that cannot be compressed well.

item.title: Autoencoders: An Ultimate Guide for Data Scientists
item.description: A comprehensive guide to autoencoder architecture with a Python implementation using TensorFlow and Keras on the MNIST dataset.

item.title: AI-Based Quality Control & Defect Detection Using Computer Vision in Manufacturing
item.description: A practical guide to defect detection using YOLOv8 and synthetic data generation with OpenCV for industrial quality control.
